parsing_result:
# BUTTON/DIAL SETTING
Access options for camera controls.

To access control options, press **MENU/OK**, select the !SET UP Icon (SET UP) tab, and choose **BUTTON/DIAL SETTING**.

!Button/Dial Setting Menu

## FOCUS LEVER SETTING
Choose the functions performed by pressing the center of the focus stick (focus lever) or by pressing the stick up, down, left, or right.

### PUSH

| Option          | Description                                                                                                                                          |
|-----------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| OFF             | Pressing the center of the stick has no effect.                                                                                                      |
| EDIT FOCUS AREA | Press the center of the stick to view a focus-area display where you can choose the focus area. If **FACE DETECTION ON** is selected for **FACE/EYE DETECTION SETTING**, Intelligent Face Detection will be temporarily disabled. |
| ZOOM            | Press the center of the stick to zoom in on the active focus area (ðŸ“– 76). If **FACE DETECTION ON** is selected for **FACE/EYE DETECTION SETTING**, Intelligent Face Detection will be temporarily disabled. |
